coded_answer.p: I am sad to read about Richard not being at his bestwell. I hope that he will recover soon and that he will make it to our conference.

As far as the organisation is concerned, an adequate number of double rooms with shower or bath have been booked for your group at the Palace hotelHotel, located across the main street from the train station. To come to our college, you can either watchwalk downhill to the lake frontlakeside (about 10 minmins) or take the new cable car from the train station. The college is just stairssteps away from the bottom end.

The end-of-conference party will take place on a boat cruising on the lake. It will start bywith a speech from the Director of the conference, followed by a meal. The recreativerecreational part will begin at 10 pm with a short musical comedy performed by some of our students and end with fireworks launched from the roof of the college at 2 am. As nights may be cold at this time of the year, may I suggest that you take with you a pullover. AppartApart ofApart from that, there is no recommendation as to what to wear.
Depending on the interests of your students, I would suggest that you visit the internet site of the tourist office: www.neuchatel.ch.
'Where are you?' is very often the first question that you will be asked when answering the phone. Why? Because somebody has invented the most popular communication device ever.
Once heavy, expensive and not reliable, the new mobile phone fits in almost any pocket and is given away by the operator to attract new customers.
Due to the mobile phone., communication has changed, not improved.

Of course it allows us to be reached everywhere (even in places you wouldn't want.)). For rescue teams, it is a great help. But isn't it a handicap outside professional life.? Shouldn't people communicate with those they are next to instead of calling someone 2 miles away.? It is not rare to see two people walking side by side, both talking on the phone. Wouldn't it be better to prepare the shopping list instead of dialingdialling home to ask which salad to buy.?
